articles.title: Saudi crown prince's economic master plan could be derailed by oil price crash
articles.description: Saudi Arabia is taking drastic steps to shore up its finances after the oil price crash and the coronavirus pandemic upended the economy and threatened Crown Prince Mohammed bin Salman's grand plan to reduce its dependence on crude exports.
